text: Luras (Lùras, Lùrisi) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,556 people lived there. Its area is 87.59 km². It is 508 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Luras
